mapper.select: select g.gid,g.gtitle1, g.gprice1, g.gprice2, g.gsoldcount, s.sshopname from meituan_goods_info g inner join meituan_seller_info s on g.sid = s.sid and s.sid = #{sid} and g.gid != #{gid}

select distinct(g.gid), g.gtitle1,g.gtitle2, g.img, g.text, g.gprice1, g.gprice2, g.gsoldcount, (select count(1) from meituan_evaluate where gid=g.gid) pjCount from meituan_goods_info g left join meituan_evaluate e on g.gid=e.gid
